```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


### Basic scatterplot graph % white vs CalEnviroScreen pollution burden score
```{r}
ggplot(data = ces) +
  geom_hex(aes(x = white, y = ces_3_0_score))+
  labs(x = "Whites in Population (%)", y = "CES Score") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "darkorchid4", high = "magenta") +
  theme_minimal()
```
